descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/59556-2-1419275758.jpg[/img]

I'm sorry. I can not speak English. This text is the thing created by machine translation.


[youtube]KpY7YpUJdKg[/youtube]

[b][size=5][u][color=#6aa84f]■About this mod[/color]
[/u][/size][/b]
 　・This MOD adds Gunner followers  "Cheryl" . 
   ・She is "Vampire Hunter". 
   ・She is a  standalone  follower.
　 ・You don't need other mods.　
   ・She is  Essential.　
   ・Her body is UNPB.
   ・She is in　Dragonsreach.　
   ・She fight using "Magic guns".
     ⇒She uses the two types of bullets！There is no limit to the number of bullets.※
　　　
　　　１．Holy bullet
　　　　　・This is the bullet that she shoot enemy.
　　　　  ・Power of the bullet is proportional to the level of the player.
　　　　
　　　　　　　＜Lv＞       <Power>　　　　
　　　　　　Lv　  0~10　：   5
             Lv　11~20　：  10
             Lv　21~30　：  15
             Lv　31~40　：  20
             Lv　41~50　：  25
             Lv　51~60　：  30
             Lv　61~70　：  35
             Lv　71~80　：  40
             Lv　80~    　：  45

       2.Heal bullet
          ・This is the bullet that she shoot player and followers.
　　　　　 This bullet to recover the health of player and followers .
           (This process does not use a script)

　　　※When you pick up the gun from her, she will fight with weapons other than guns.
　　　　　When you returned the guns to her, she will fight again with a guns.

 [color=#ff0000]          If she has both guns and other weapons, she attack force will select a strong weapon.
           Therefore, it is better not to have a weapon other than a gun to her.


 [/color] 　・I've updated this mod. Changes are as follows:
　　　①Changing the face of the mesh.
      ②Change the texture (Fair Skin → SG)
　　　③Change as gunshot sounds
　　　④I weakened the Holy bullet　of blow off effect,

[b][u][size=5][color=#6aa84f]■Mods Used for Screenshots[/color]
[/size][/u]
[/b]　　 ・[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/]Face Light[/url] by tktk1
